HashReturn.para: A 32-bit signed integer hash code combined from the given 32-bit singed integers.

Equals.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current Mutable Tuple object is equal to a specified object.)
Equals.param: The object to compare with this instance.
Equals.returns: True if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, false.

IStructuralEquatable.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current Mutable Tuple object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.
IStructuralEquatable.param: The object to compare with this instance.
An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.
IStructuralEquatable.returns: True if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Returns the hash code for the current Mutable Tuple object.)

IStructuralEquatableGetHashCode.summary: Calculates the hash code for the current Mutable Tuple object by using a specified computation method.
IStructuralEquatableGetHashCode.param: An object whose GetHashCode method calculates the hash code of the current Mutable Tuple object.

ITupleGetHashCode.summary: Calculates the hash code for the current Mutable Tuple object by using a specified computation method.
